name: Ultimate Rollies
description:
1v1 battles with dice! 

You have a small team of dice that are ready to fight. You and an opponent start with 3 dice, and immediately roll them. After that, each round you get to choose to reroll 1 dice to help increase your overall total. 

Whichever side has the lower total loses HP. (Both sides lose HP if a tie occurs).

Simple!

However, there are a few extra rules at play...

  • If you roll the minimum or maximum number on your dice, the dice changes!
    Example: If a d6 rolls a 1, it changes into a d4. If a d6 rolls a 6, it changes into a d8.
    This can increase all the way up to a d20! Additionally, the new dice immediately rerolls, which means it can transform multiple times a round. Also, if a 1 is rolled on a d4, HP is lost!
  • Every other round, you get to choose between two upgrades that change your dice pretty dramatically. Examples: One dice instantly becomes a d10. All d6's get +2.

If you lose all your HP or cause your opponent to lose all theirs, the game is over.


Note: Press F11 to toggle fullscreen if desired

We made this game in 48 hours in Gamemaker Studio 2 for the GMTK Game Jam 2022, pouring our blood, sweat, and tears into it. All art, music, and sounds were created by us. We hope you enjoy our little game!
